GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.82
GSD.description:
can: m_can: pci: add missing m_can_class_free_dev() in probe/remove methods

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.82 by commit ea8dc27bb044e19868155e500ce397007be98656, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit cab7ffc0324f053c8fb56c821cdd63dc0383270d. For more details please see the references link.
